docs.title: Kano Agent Backlog Skill API
docs.text: Complete Python API reference for the Kano Agent Backlog Skill.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
from kano_backlog_core import BacklogManager
from kano_backlog_ops import WorkItem

# Initialize backlog operations
manager = BacklogManager()

# Create work items
item = WorkItem.create(title="New feature", type="task")

docs.title: Core Modules
docs.text:
• Core - Core backlog management (kano_backlog_core)
  • CLI - Command-line interface (kano_backlog_cli)
  • Operations - Business operations (kano_backlog_ops)

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text: Use the navigation menu to explore the complete API reference.
